alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:42AM CDT until March 28 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County. Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallahala Creek At Laurel. * WHEN...From late tonight to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water begins to cover Old Sandersville Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river should begin rising later today and is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 16.0 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Tallahala Creek Laurel 13.0 10.4 Thu 8 am CDT 14.8 15.8 14.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 900 PM CDT.
